info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 28 at 1:48PM MST until January 01 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with localized amounts of 3 feet possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
